entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Upgrade To Proï¼š$29.99 â†’ $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

Keep your digital wallets and keychains safe with Antivirus One, your personal cyber security expert. Antivirus One offers live antivirus monitoring to protect your Mac from adware, ransomware, spyware and all kinds of malware attacks. Download now and say goodbye to pop-up scams, spyware and viruses! Developed exclusively by the worldâ€™s largest antivirus and spyware active monitoring lab at Trend Micro. Secure your Mac with these powerful Antivirus One protection features: 1.Â Real Time Detection Live malware detector on the go. Protect your Mac against all threats 24/7. 2. Virus Scanner Quick scan, deep scan or customize scan locations to safeguard every part of your disk. 3. Virus Cleaner (In-App Purchase required) Automatically remove viruses completely for the security of your system and privacy. 4. Adware Cleaner Get rid of pop-ups, adware, and browser hijackers so you can browse at peace. 5. Privacy Cleaner Customize your online transparency. Turn invisible without leaving a trace in your browser. 6. Safe Search Flag safety ratings of every Google search result. 7. Web Threat Protection Prevents users from visiting phishing websites. We highly recommend full disk scanning using Antivirus One on a regular basis to keep your Mac safe from security threats. We offer two auto-renewing subscription options: â€” Monthly: as low as $2.99 â€” Yearly: as low as $19.99 Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will auto-renew unless canceled. â€” Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase â€” Subscription may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the userâ€™s Account Setting after purchase. â€” No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. â€” Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. â€” Your account will be charged for renewal for the amount of your current subscription within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. All cost for subscriptions are mentioned above. We value your feedback, it helps us to improve Antivirus One to better serve you! Please send us your comments or suggestions in the App Store or by the feedback page inside Antivirus One. entry.title: The Audio Converter
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium Passï¼š$19.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $19.99]

Application Description

Quickly convert your audio or video files to nearly any audio format! 1. Select your input file 2. Choose your output format ( MP3, WAV, M4A, AAC etc. ) 3. Convert! It will only take a few seconds. 4. Done! Listen right away, or open in your favorite app Here are the video and audio output formats you can choose from: MP3, M4A, AAC, FLAC, OGG, WAV, WMA, AIFF You can convert from dozens of input formats, here are some of the most popular formats we support converting from: MOV, M4A, MP3, WMA, MP4, WAV, OGG, OPUS, AMR, AAC, WEBM, MID and many more! Save, Share or Listen to your converted audio files in your favorite apps immediately. Conversion is done on a secure cloud server, which makes conversion easier, faster and much more battery-friendly. You must have an internet connection to use this app. Files are immediately deleted from the server after conversion. While the files are immediately deleted after conversion or cancellation, you should be aware that by using this app, you agree that your files will be sent over to internet from the app to the conversion server. We've also recently added support for local conversions for many popular conversion types. These conversions don't require a server, and are usually done almost instantly! We are continuing to add support for more local conversions with each update. This app includes an optional auto-renewable subscription (Premium Pass): Premium Pass beings with a free trial period, then an auto-renewable monthly subscription when trial ends. Payment will be charged to your Apple account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration/price selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hrs before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Apple Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of the free initial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription. Privacy Policy: https://float.support/the-audio-converter-mac/privacy Terms of Use: https://float.support/the-audio-converter-mac/terms

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: VOX: MP3 & FLAC Music Player
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LOOP for VOX Subscriptionï¼š$109.99 â†’ $49.99 [$49.99 ~ $109.99]

Application Description

#1 Hi-Res audio player for Mac & iPhone. Music just sounds better! *NEW* Introducing VOX Premium â€“ Your Ultimate Music Experience. VOX Premium adds a stunning cloud streaming features and unlimited music storage without a decline in quality. Sync, stream and cache your entire music library on Mac and iPhone in a way that suits you best! Listen to your music regardless of the format: â€¢ Play numerous lossy and lossless (FLAC, APE, WAV, DSD, etc.) audio formats; â€¢ Export playlists in various formats (PLS, M3U, XSPF); â€¢ Open different playlist types including M3U, PLS, XSPF, and the popular CUE format used to store CD rips; â€¢ Play audio files stored on NAS devices and other network drives. Manage your music easily:Â  â€¢ Control the player from the main interface, Dock context menu or main menu controls; â€¢ Automatically search for all the missing album artwork from MusicBrainz and Last.fm databases; â€¢ Use keyboard media keys, headphones controls, and Apple Remote to control the playback (requires VOX Preference Pane); â€¢ Easily add music via smart drop zones, open dialog and Finder context menu; â€¢ Use the Equalizer with presets & custom mode, crossfade, fade on play/pause, converting music to 5.1 or 7.1 format; â€¢ Preview album artwork from your Dock icon; â€¢ Gapless playback support; â€¢ Get system or Growl playback notifications. Focus on music, not the source:Â  â€¢ Work with different audio sources including custom Playlists, iTunes Library, online radio and much more; â€¢ Scrobble to Last.fm to keep your listening stats up-to-date; â€¢ Play any song, any playlist you find on YouTube via VOX FLAC Player, put all your YouTube songs into one media collection. Full SoundCloud integration: â€¢ Easily control SoundCloud via VOX; â€¢ Access the largest music database in the world and discover new tunes; â€¢ Bring your SoundCloud stream and likes directly into VOX. YouTube source: â€¢ Press CMD+U and paste any link from YouTube to play it in VOX. You can add it to VOX collections as well. Last.fm: â€¢ Scrobbling for your music stream; Radio access for VOX Premium subscribers (**NEW**): â€¢ 30'000+ Radio stations categorized by genres and countries!Â  Equip yourself with all of the audiophile tools of VOX Premium: â€¢ Advanced Audio Features: HOG Mode; Improved multi-output device support; â€¢ Convert stereophonic audio in your headphones to binaural using Bauer DSP (BS2B) technology; â€¢ Automatically Pause playback on headphones disconnection; â€¢ Take full advantage of AirPlay (10.8+) to listen with any of your wireless output devices. â€¢ VOX also supports SONOS wireless speakers systems. The beauty of VOX Player is in its simplicity, yet behind the minimal exterior lies a powerful Music Player with a ton of features and support for all audio formats you may ever need.Â  â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“ VOX Premium is available by auto-renewable subscriptions: - $4.99 per month; - $49.99 per year. Your credit card will be charged through your iTunes Account after the purchase confirmation. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.Â  Your subscriptions can be managed in your iTunes Account Settings after purchase is made. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription. VOX Premium privacy policy:Â https://vox.rocks/privacy VOX Premium terms and conditions:Â https://vox.rocks/terms P.S.: FLAC Player, ALAC Player, Lossless Player, SoundCloud Stream Solution, YouTube MP3 Music, Hi-Res audio Player - check all of them in one VOX Music Player.

entry.title: Audio Editor & Music Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Permanent membershipï¼š$11.99 â†’ $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $14.99]

Application Description

Want to make your own unique phone ringtones? Or want to combine multiple songs and synthesize the music you want? Or want to know the effect of mixing different songs? Audio Editor & Music Mixer is an easy to operate music cutting and mixing tool. Simple and excellent, functional and practical! Whether you are a professional musician or music amateur, you can play easily. Features: 1.Professional ringtone clip: free to edit, the maximum clipping of the ringtone is 40s (in line with the characteristics of ringtones) 2.Simple music stitching: song editing and splicing as a whole,connect the favorite songs 3.Unique music mixing: free to cut the two songs, mixed together to play, feel different music effects! Subscription instrutionsï¼š - After you subscribe to the VIP, you have unlimited access to all features - Subscribe to provide 4 types of VIP services, including: weekly VIP service, monthly VIP service, yearly VIP service, permanent VIP service - Subscribe to $2.49 per week, $4.49 per month, $13.49 for 1 year and $14.99 for permanent - The purchase process is to deduct the purchase amount from the iTunes account - Account will be charged at the cost of the selected package within 24 hours prior to the current period - Cancellation of current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period.But you can cancel next subscription. - You can access our privacy policy by visiting (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_en.html - You can access (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_en.html to read the Terms of Service *The price is equivalent to the 'Apple App Store Matrix' which is equivalent to the subscription price in US dollars.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: VOX: MP3 & FLAC Music Player
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • VOX Premium Subscriptionï¼š$49.99 â†’ $15.99 [$15.99 ~ $49.99]

Application Description

#1 Hi-Res audio player for Mac & iPhone. Music just sounds better! *NEW* Introducing VOX Premium â€“ Your Ultimate Music Experience. VOX Premium adds a stunning cloud streaming features and unlimited music storage without a decline in quality. Sync, stream and cache your entire music library on Mac and iPhone in a way that suits you best! Listen to your music regardless of the format: â€¢ Play numerous lossy and lossless (FLAC, APE, WAV, DSD, etc.) audio formats; â€¢ Export playlists in various formats (PLS, M3U, XSPF); â€¢ Open different playlist types including M3U, PLS, XSPF, and the popular CUE format used to store CD rips; â€¢ Play audio files stored on NAS devices and other network drives. Manage your music easily:Â  â€¢ Control the player from the main interface, Dock context menu or main menu controls; â€¢ Automatically search for all the missing album artwork from MusicBrainz and Last.fm databases; â€¢ Use keyboard media keys, headphones controls, and Apple Remote to control the playback (requires VOX Preference Pane); â€¢ Easily add music via smart drop zones, open dialog and Finder context menu; â€¢ Use the Equalizer with presets & custom mode, crossfade, fade on play/pause, converting music to 5.1 or 7.1 format; â€¢ Preview album artwork from your Dock icon; â€¢ Gapless playback support; â€¢ Get system or Growl playback notifications. Focus on music, not the source:Â  â€¢ Work with different audio sources including custom Playlists, iTunes Library, online radio and much more; â€¢ Scrobble to Last.fm to keep your listening stats up-to-date; â€¢ Play any song, any playlist you find on YouTube via VOX FLAC Player, put all your YouTube songs into one media collection. Full SoundCloud integration: â€¢ Easily control SoundCloud via VOX; â€¢ Access the largest music database in the world and discover new tunes; â€¢ Bring your SoundCloud stream and likes directly into VOX. YouTube source: â€¢ Press CMD+U and paste any link from YouTube to play it in VOX. You can add it to VOX collections as well. Last.fm: â€¢ Scrobbling for your music stream; Radio access for VOX Premium subscribers (**NEW**): â€¢ 30'000+ Radio stations categorized by genres and countries!Â  Equip yourself with all of the audiophile tools of VOX Premium: â€¢ Advanced Audio Features: HOG Mode; Improved multi-output device support; â€¢ Convert stereophonic audio in your headphones to binaural using Bauer DSP (BS2B) technology; â€¢ Automatically Pause playback on headphones disconnection; â€¢ Take full advantage of AirPlay (10.8+) to listen with any of your wireless output devices. â€¢ VOX also supports SONOS wireless speakers systems. The beauty of VOX Player is in its simplicity, yet behind the minimal exterior lies a powerful Music Player with a ton of features and support for all audio formats you may ever need.Â  â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“ VOX Premium is available by auto-renewable subscriptions: - $4.99 per month; - $49.99 per year. Visual Cue Pro is an advanced, easy-to-use audio player for iOS and iPadOS. Main Features: â€¢ Waveform view for visual seeking and setting up cue points â€¢ Zoom functionality for more precise seeking on longer waveforms â€¢ Caches waveforms for fast display â€¢ Supports unlimited cue points per file â€¢ Quickly switch between cue points across multiple audio files â€¢ Does not alter your precious source files in any way â€¢ Drag & drop files directly from Files and other apps â€¢ Designed for speed and efficiency â€¢ GPU-based waveform renderer â€¢ Supports Dark Mode Collections: â€¢ Import files from Files using drag & drop â€¢ Manage your music library â€¢ Create cue points within each item Playlists: â€¢ Import files from Collections using drag & drop (cue points included) â€¢ Import files from Files using drag & drop (without cue points) â€¢ Create cue points within each item (shared across playlists if the item is from a Collection) â€¢ Reorder items using drag & drop in your desired order For Music Producers: â€¢ Manage your library of reference tracks to compare with your own â€¢ Quickly jump between cue points in your reference tracks â€¢ Manage and listen to your own tracks â€¢ Organize production elements and recorded source material For DJs: â€¢ Manage your library of tracks â€¢ Set up cue points in your tracks â€¢ Compile DJ sets by quickly jumping between cue points in different tracks â€¢ Manage and listen to your own mixes â€¢ Bookmark tracks in other DJsâ€™ sets and discover new music faster Visual Cue Pro is an offline music player, music library manager, and music organizer with lossless playback, widely used in sound studios, by music directors, A&R, and for audio transcribing. It's also perfect for venues, theaters, churches, DJs, and more! It features full-screen support, native Apple Silicon support, Dark Mode, and cloud drive compatibility. Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Permanent membershipï¼š$11.99 â†’ $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $14.99]

Application Description

Want to make your own unique phone ringtones? Or want to combine multiple songs and synthesize the music you want? Or want to know the effect of mixing different songs? Audio Editor & Music Mixer is an easy to operate music cutting and mixing tool. Simple and excellent, functional and practical! Whether you are a professional musician or music amateur, you can play easily. Features: 1.Professional ringtone clip: free to edit, the maximum clipping of the ringtone is 40s (in line with the characteristics of ringtones) 2.Simple music stitching: song editing and splicing as a whole,connect the favorite songs 3.Unique music mixing: free to cut the two songs, mixed together to play, feel different music effects! Subscription instrutionsï¼š - After you subscribe to the VIP, you have unlimited access to all features - Subscribe to provide 4 types of VIP services, including: weekly VIP service, monthly VIP service, yearly VIP service, permanent VIP service - Subscribe to $2.49 per week, $4.49 per month, $13.49 for 1 year and $14.99 for permanent - The purchase process is to deduct the purchase amount from the iTunes account - Account will be charged at the cost of the selected package within 24 hours prior to the current period - Cancellation of current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period.But you can cancel next subscription. - You can access our privacy policy by visiting (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_en.html - You can access (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_en.html to read the Terms of Service *The price is equivalent to the 'Apple App Store Matrix' which is equivalent to the subscription price in US dollars.

entry.title: Vythm VJ - Music Visualizer DJ
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All features and modesï¼š$44.99 â†’ $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $44.99]

Application Description

--- Experience Your Music with Vythm --- Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely. --- Your Vision, Your Visualization --- Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision: - Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds. - MIDI input for precise visual control. - NDI streaming support for sharing your creations. - Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more. - Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments. And much more! The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription. --- Input Formats --- Select your music from a variety of sources: - Import any mp3 or m4a files. - Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported). - Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases. - Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration. --- Record Your Masterpiece --- Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece. --- Share Your Thoughts --- Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org. If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm! Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
